text.div:
Generated Narrative: ImplementationGuide hl7.fhir.eu.hdr

Hl7EuHospitalDischargeReportIg

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

http://hl7.eu/fhir/hdr/ImplementationGuide/hl7.fhir.eu.hdr

This guide describes how the Hospital Discharge Report can be represented in the European REALM.

name: Hl7EuHospitalDischargeReportIg
title: HL7 Europe Hospital Discharge Report
description: This guide describes how the Hospital Discharge Report can be represented in the European REALM.
copyright: Used by permission of HL7 Europe, all rights reserved Creative Commons License

extension.valueMarkdown: Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on HL7 Terminology
Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on the HL7 Extension Pack

grouping.name: eHN Hospital Discharge Report Guidelines (Informative)
grouping.description: Logical models representing the eHN Hospital Discharge Report Guidelines. This is informative material.

grouping.name: eHN Logical Model mappings (Informative)
grouping.description: Concept Maps describing how the data set specified by the eHN Laboratory Guidelines is supposed to be implemented by using this guide. Informative for this version of the guide.

grouping.name: Actors and Obligations (Informative)
grouping.description: Actors and Obligations used to describe the Hospital Discharge Report functional requirements for the specified data elements. Informative for this version of the guide.

resource.name: A - Hospital Discharge Report (eHN)
resource.description: Hospital Discharge Report

resource.name: A.1 - Hospital Discharge Report header data element
resource.description: Hospital Discharge Report - Hospital Discharge Report header data element - A.1 eHN

resource.name: A.1.1 - Identification and A.1.2 - related contact information of the Patient/subject
resource.description: Hospital Discharge Report - Hospital Discharge Report subject data element - A.1.1 and A.1.2 eHN

resource.name: A.2.1 - Advance Directives (eHN)
resource.description: Hospital Discharge Report - Advance Directives - A.2.1 eHN

resource.name: A.2.2 - Alerts (eHN)
resource.description: Hospital Discharge Report - Alerts - A.2.2 eHN

resource.name: A.2.3 - Encounter (eHN)
resource.description: Hospital Discharge Report - Encounter - A.2.3 eHN

resource.name: A.2.4 - Admission evaluation (eHN)
resource.description: Hospital Discharge Report - Admission evaluation - A.2.4 eHN

resource.name: A.2.5 - Patient history (eHN)
resource.description: Hospital Discharge Report - Patient history - A.2.5 eHN

resource.name: A.2.6 - Hospital stay (eHN)
resource.description: Hospital Discharge Report - Hospital stay - A.2.6 eHN

resource.name: A.2.7 - Discharge details (eHN)
resource.description: Hospital Discharge Report - Discharge details - A.2.7 eHN

resource.name: A.2.7.1 - Objective findings
resource.description: Hospital Discharge Report - Objective Findings- A.2.7.1 eHN

resource.name: A.2.7.2 - Functional status
resource.description: Hospital Discharge Report - Functional status  - A.2.7.2 eHN

resource.name: A.2.8.1 - Care plan
resource.description: Hospital Discharge Report - Care plan after discharge - A.2.8.1 eHN

resource.name: A.2.8.2 - Medication summary
resource.description: Hospital Discharge Report - Medication Summary after discharge - A.2.8.2 eHN

resource.name: Admission Urgency Value Set
resource.description: Hospital Discharge Report Admission Urgency value set includes selected codes from HL7 v3-ActPriority code system.

resource.name: Allergens Value Set
resource.description:
List of substances that can cause an allergic reactions or an Intolerance.
This Values Set is a composition of the eHDSI Value Set:
- eHDSIAllergenNoDrug
- eHDSIActiveIngredient
- eHDSISubstance

resource.name: Allergy Intolerance
resource.description: Allergy intolerance substances value set. This value set includes codes from SNOMED Clinical Terms®: all descendants of 373873005 \|Pharmaceutical / biologic product (product)\|; all descendants of 105590001 \|Substance (substance)\|; all descendants of 418038007 \|Propensity to adverse reactions to substance (finding)\|

resource.name: Allergy Intolerance (HDR)
resource.description: This profile constrains the AllergyIntolerance resource for the purpose of this project.

resource.name: Allergy Intolerance (with exceptions)
resource.description: Allergy intolerance codes value set. This value set includes codes from SNOMED Clinical Terms®: all descendants of 373873005 \|Pharmaceutical / biologic product (product)\|; all descendants of 105590001 \|Substance (substance)\|; all descendants of 418038007 \|Propensity to adverse reactions to substance (finding)\| plus codes for absent and unknown allergies.

resource.name: Allergy Intolerance: Obligations
resource.description: This profile defines obligations for the AllergyIntolerance resource for the purpose of this project.

resource.name: Bundle (HDR)
resource.description: Clinical document used to represent a Hospital Discharge Report for the scope of this guide.

resource.name: Bundle: obligations
resource.description: This profile defines obligations for the Hospital Discharge Report for the scope of this guide.

resource.name: Cancer Stage Grading: Snomed CT
resource.description: Identifying codes based on the timing of classification for stage group observations.

resource.name: Cancer Stage Group: SNOMED CT
resource.description: Identifying codes based on the timing of classification for stage group observations.

resource.name: Care Plan (HDR)
resource.description: This profile constrains the CarePlan resource for the purpose of this guide.

resource.name: Care Plan: obligations
resource.description: This profile defines obligations for the CarePlan resource for the purpose of this guide.

resource.name: Composition (HDR)
resource.description: Clinical document used to represent a Hospital Discharge Report (HDR) for the scope of this guide.

resource.name: Composition: obligations
resource.description: This profile defines obligations for a Hospital Discharge Report (HDR) for the scope of this guide.

resource.name: Condition (HDR)
resource.description: This profile represents the constraint applied to the Condition in the scope of this guide. It support the Diagnostic summary part of the eHN data model adding two additional categories: First category distingueshes conditions present at admission and acquired during hospital stay, while second category is used to indicate impact of the condition to the treatement during hospital stay (treated, untreated).

resource.name: Condition Value Set
resource.description: Hospital Discharge Report Condition value set includes selected codes from recommended EU code systems for health conditions (WHO-ICD-10, SNOMED CT and Orphacodes).

resource.name: Condition: obligations
resource.description: This profile defines obligations for the Condition in the scope of this guide. It support the Diagnostic summary part of the eHN data model adding two additional categories: First category distingueshes conditions present at admission and acquired during hospital stay, while second category is used to indicate impact of the condition to the treatement during hospital stay (treated, untreated).

resource.name: Consent (Advance Directives HDR)
resource.description: This profile constrains the Consent resource for the purpose representing Advance Directives for the scope of this guide.

resource.name: Consent: obligations
resource.description: This profile defines obligations for the Consent resource for the purpose representing Advance Directives for the scope of this guide.

resource.name: Device (HDR)
resource.description: This profile represents the constraints applied to the Device resource for the purpose of this guide. A device used by or implanted on the patient is described in the hospital discharge report as an instance of a Device resource constrained by this profile.

resource.name: Device: obligations
resource.description: This profile represents the constraints applied to the Device resource for the purpose of this guide. A device used by or implanted on the patient is described in the hospital discharge report as an instance of a Device resource constrained by this profile.

resource.name: DeviceUseStatement (HDR)
resource.description: This profile represents the constraints applied to the DeviceUseStatement resource for the purpose of this guide. A device used by or implanted on the patient is described in the hospital discharge report as an instance of a Device resource constrained by this profile.

resource.name: DeviceUseStatement: obligations
resource.description: This profile represents the constraints applied to the DeviceUseStatement resource for the purpose of this guide. A device used by or implanted on the patient is described in the hospital discharge report as an instance of a Device resource constrained by this profile.

resource.name: eHDSI Condition Present On Admission
resource.description: The Value Set is used to assert if a condition is Present on Admission

resource.name: eHDSI Treatment Class
resource.description: The Value set is used to encode category of treatment of the condition during encounter

resource.name: eHN Admission Evaluation Model to this guide Map
resource.description: eHN HDR Admission Evaluation Model to this guide Map

resource.name: eHN Advance Directives Model to this guide Map
resource.description: eHN HDR Advance Directives Model to this guide mapping

resource.name: eHN Alerts Model to this guide Map
resource.description: eHN HDR Alerts Model to this guide mapping

resource.name: eHN Encounter Model to this guide Map
resource.description: eHN HDR Encounter Model to this guide mapping

resource.name: eHN Functional Status Model to this guide Map
resource.description: eHN HDR Functional Status Model to this guide Map

resource.name: eHN HDR Model to this guide Map
resource.description: eHN Hospital Discharge Report Model to this guide mapping

resource.name: eHN Header Model to this guide Map
resource.description: eHN HDR Header Model to this guide mapping

resource.name: eHN Hospital Stay Model to this guide Map
resource.description: eHN HDR Hospital Stay  Model to this guide Map

resource.name: eHN Hospital Stay Model to this guide Map
resource.description: eHN HDR Hospital Stay  Model to this guide Map

resource.name: eHN Medication Summary Model to this guide Map
resource.description: eHN HDR Medication Summary Model to this guide Map

resource.name: eHN Objective Findings Model to this guide Map
resource.description: eHN HDR Objective Findings Model to this guide Map

resource.name: eHN Plan of Care Model to this guide Map
resource.description: eHN HDR Plan of Care Model to this guide Map

resource.name: eHN Subject Model to this guide Map
resource.description: eHN HDR Subject Model to this guide mapping

resource.name: Encounter (HDR)
resource.description: This profile defines how to represent Inpatient Encounter in HL7 FHIR for the scope of this guide.

resource.name: Encounter Class Value Set
resource.description: Hospital Discharge Report Encounter Class specifies a general class of inpatient encounter as being accute, nonaccute, emergency, short stay ...

resource.name: Encounter Voluntary Status Value Set
resource.description: Value set of voluntary nature of the encounter.

resource.name: Encounter: Obligations
resource.description: This profile defines obligations for Inpatient Encounter in HL7 FHIR for the scope of this guide.

resource.name: Exposure of transmissible agents
resource.description: HDR exposure agent value set. This value set includes codes from SNOMED Clinical Terms®: all descendants of 40733004 "Infectious disease (disorder)" and ICD-10 all descendants of chapter I: "Certain infectious and parasitic diseases"

resource.name: FamilyMemberHistory (HDR)
resource.description: This profile represents the constraints applied to the FamilyMemberHistory resource by this guide.

resource.name: FamilyMemberHistory: obligations
resource.description: This profile represents the constraints applied to the FamilyMemberHistory resource by this guide.

resource.name: Flag (HDR)
resource.description: This profile constrains the Flag resource to represent alerts or warnings in FHIR for the purpose of this project.

resource.name: Flag: obligations
resource.description: This profile defines obligations for the Flag resource to represent alerts or warnings in FHIR for the purpose of this project.

resource.name: HDR Consumer
resource.description: Hospital Discharge Report Report Consumer: a system receiving/querying and using a Hospital Discharge Report.

resource.name: HDR Creator
resource.description: Hospital Discharge Report Creator: a system generating and sending/providing a Hospital Discharge Report to a Consumer or to a Repository for report storage and sharing.

resource.name: HDR Repository
resource.description: Hospital Discharge Report Report Repository: a system maintaining a copy of the received Hospital Discharge Report, to store and make it available for the consumers.

resource.name: Human Name: Obligations
resource.description: This profile defines obligations for an human Patient name in FHIR for the purpose of this guide.

resource.name: Immunization (HDR)
resource.description: This profile constrains the Immunization resource for the purpose of this guide.

resource.name: Immunization AdministeredProduct
resource.description:
This extension references the Medication administered during the vaccination.
It simulates the beahviour of the reference part of the administeredProduct R5 element

resource.name: Immunization: obligations
resource.description: This profile defines obligations for the Immunization resource for the purpose of this guide.

resource.name: ImmunizationRecommendation (HDR)
resource.description: This profile defines how to represent Immunization Recommandations for the purpose of this guide.

resource.name: ImmunizationRecommendation: obligations
resource.description: This profile defines how to represent Immunization Recommandations for the purpose of this guide.

resource.name: In-patient Encounter Type Value Set
resource.description: Hospital Discharge Report Encounter Type allows to classify encounter using general type of care provision regimen during the inpatient encounter. Value set includes concepts from the SNOMED CT descendants of 225351009 (Care provision regime) but needs to be further dicsussed

resource.name: In-patient Encounter Type Value Set
resource.description: Hospital Discharge Report Encounter Type allows to classify encounter using general type of care provision regimen during the inpatient encounter. Value set includes concepts from the SNOMED CT descendants of 225351009 (Care provision regime) but needs to be further dicsussed

resource.name: Medical Devices (SNOMED CT) - Xpandh
resource.description: This value set includes codes from SNOMED Clinical Terms®: all descendants of 49062001 \|Device (physical object)\|.

resource.name: Medical Devices - SNOMED CT + Absent/Unknown - IPS
resource.description: This value set includes codes from SNOMED Clinical Terms (SNOMED CT®) that are included in: all descendants of 49062001 \|Device (physical object)\|, plus IPS codes for absent/unknown devices.

resource.name: Medication (HDR)
resource.description: This profile constrains the Medication resource for the purpose of this guide, adapted from the MPD work.

resource.name: Medication: obligations
resource.description: This profile defines obligations for the Medication resource for the purpose of this guide, adapted from the MPD work.

resource.name: MedicationAdministration (HDR)
resource.description: This profile constrains the MedicationAdministration resource for the purpose of this guide, adapted from the MPD work.

resource.name: MedicationAdministration: obligations
resource.description: This profile defines obligations for the MedicationAdministration resource for the purpose of this guide, adapted from the MPD work.

resource.name: MedicationDispense (HDR)
resource.description: This profile constrains the MedicationDispense resource for the purpose of this guide, adapted from the MPD work.

resource.name: MedicationDispense: obligations
resource.description: This profile defines obligations for the MedicationDispense resource for the purpose of this guide, adapted from the MPD work.

resource.name: MedicationRequest (HDR)
resource.description: This profile constrains the MedicationRequest resource for the purpose of this guide, adapted from the MPD work.

resource.name: MedicationRequest: obligations
resource.description: This profile defines obligations for the MedicationRequest resource for the purpose of this guide, adapted from the MPD work.

resource.name: MedicationStatement (HDR)
resource.description: This profile constrains the MedicationStatement resource for the purpose of this guide, adapted from the MPD work.

resource.name: MedicationStatement: obligations
resource.description: This profile defines obligations for the MedicationStatement resource for the purpose of this guide, adapted from the MPD work.

resource.name: Observation Codes for Distant Metastases Category
resource.description: Identifying codes based on the timing of classification for distant metastases (M) staging observations.

resource.name: Observation Codes for Primary Tumor Category
resource.description: Identifying codes based on the timing of classification for primary tumor (T) staging observations.

resource.name: Observation Codes for Regional Node Category
resource.description: Identifying codes based on the timing of classification for regional node (N) staging observations.

resource.name: Observation: country visited (HDR)
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the Observation resource to record, search, and fetch travel history.

resource.name: Observation: country visited: obligations
resource.description: This profile sets minimum expectations for the Observation resource to record, search, and fetch travel history.

resource.name: Observation: Infectious Contact (HDR)
resource.description: Infectious Contact profile represents potential patient exposure to an agent (exposure source).

resource.name: Observation: Infectious Contact: obligations
resource.description: This profile defines obligations for the Infectious Contact profile.

resource.name: Observation: SDOH (HDR)
resource.description: Profile for Social Determinants of Health (SDOH) observations that involve assessment (e.g., by a provider, payer, etc.) as opposed to being derived only from screening surveys (as is the case for the SDOHCC Screening Response Observation).

resource.name: Observation: SDOH: obligations
resource.description: Profile for Social Determinants of Health (SDOH) observations that involve assessment (e.g., by a provider, payer, etc.) as opposed to being derived only from screening surveys (as is the case for the SDOHCC Screening Response Observation).

resource.name: Patient: Obligations
resource.description: This profile defines obligations for an human Patient in FHIR for the purpose of this guide.

resource.name: Procedure (HDR)
resource.description: This profile represents the constraints applied to the Procedure resource by this guide.

resource.name: Procedure codes: Snomed CT
resource.description: This value set includes codes from SNOMED Clinical Terms®: descendants of 71388002 \|Procedure (procedure)\|, excluding [all subtypes of 14734007 \|Administrative procedure (procedure)\|, all subtypes of 59524001 \|Blood bank procedure (procedure)\|, all subtypes of 389067005 \|Community health procedure (procedure)\|, all subtypes of 442006003 \|Determination of information related to transfusion (procedure)\|, all subtypes of 225288009 \|Environmental care procedure (procedure)\|, all subtypes of 308335008 \|Patient encounter procedure (procedure)\|, all subtypes of 710135002 \|Promotion (procedure)\|, all subtypes of 389084004 \|Staff related procedure (procedure)\|].

resource.name: Procedure: obligations
resource.description: This profile defines obligations for the Procedure resource by this guide.

resource.name: Procedures - SNOMED CT + Absent/Unknown - IPS
resource.description: This value set includes codes from SNOMED Clinical Terms®: descendants of 71388002 \|Procedure (procedure)\|, excluding [all subtypes of 14734007 \|Administrative procedure (procedure)\|, all subtypes of 59524001 \|Blood bank procedure (procedure)\|, all subtypes of 389067005 \|Community health procedure (procedure)\|, all subtypes of 442006003 \|Determination of information related to transfusion (procedure)\|, all subtypes of 225288009 \|Environmental care procedure (procedure)\|, all subtypes of 308335008 \|Patient encounter procedure (procedure)\|, all subtypes of 710135002 \|Promotion (procedure)\|, all subtypes of 389084004 \|Staff related procedure (procedure)\|], plus IPS codes for absent/unknown procedures.

resource.name: SDOH Observation codes
resource.description: This value set contains all of LOINC and SNOMED CT.

resource.name: Specimen: Obligations
resource.description: This profile defines obligations for Specimen in FHIR for the purpose of this guide.

resource.name: Temporary HDR Code System
resource.description: This is a temporary code system defined to collect concepts expected required by this project, but for which international coded concepts have not been identified yet.

resource.name: Treatment Class Value Set
resource.description: Value set for category of treatement of the conditoin during encounter.
